## {{< fa basket-shopping >}} Ingredients

- [ ] Add your ingredients here
- [1] 250g Carrots
- [2] 125g Vegan Butter at room temperature
- [3] 100g sugar/maple syrup
- [4] 1 pinch salt
- [5] 1 pinch vanilla extract
- [6] 2 flax eggs
- [7] 125g all-purpose flour
- [8] 1/2 tsp cinnamon
- [9] 1 1/2 tsp baking powder
- [10] 100g almonds
- [11] 1 tsp apple cider vinegar
- [12] 1/2 tsp baking soda

## {{< fa kitchen-set >}} Procedure

1. Preheat Oven to 180Â°C top and bottom heat. Grease a round baking pan.
1. For the batter, peel the carrots and finely grate them.
1. Beat the soft butter with sugar, salt and vanilla until creamy in a mixing bowl. Then stir in the grated carrots and flax eggs.
1. Now sift in the flour, cinnamon, and baking powder. Also add the almonds, vinegar and baking soda and stir everything briefly until just combined.
1. Fill tFill the batter into the prepared baking pan, smooth it out and bake on medium rack for 30-40 minutes.he batter into the prepared baking pan, smooth it out and bake on medium rack for 30-40 minutes.
